body_html: I'm thinking we can solve this once and for all by simply printing some sample outputs at every checkpoint so it's easy people to see if it's starting to make sense? This way people can monitor their code without having to come here and find this issue to find out whether the model is working.

body: I'm thinking we can solve this once and for all by simply printing some sample outputs at every checkpoint so it's easy people to see if it's starting to make sense? This way people can monitor their code without having to come here and find this issue to find out whether the model is working.
